column2: Seaview Apartments for Rent - Fully Furnished, Equipped and Serviced
column6: Selection of amazing 1 and 2 bedroom SEA VIEW apartments available for medium to long term let. Each apartment is equipped with all the creature comforts you would expect from a 5-STAR hotel. Ideal for a single, couple or even a family move in and start living! All what you would ever need is included in the price.- Fully air-conditioned throughout- Living room, kitchenette and bedroom(s) with en-suite with rainfall shower - Kitchenette with washing machines, hob, microwave, toaster, kettle and all cutlery & crockery- Each apartment has private balcony overlooking the sea (2 bedroom ones have partial view)- High-speed wifi throughout and LED 40"+ PEO TV with all the channels - Gated with with 24x7 security- Auto standby generator, lift to all floors, etc.- Large swimming pool facing the beach, direct access to beach and on-site restaurant serving International and local cuisine- Only 20 mins to airport, free trade-zone and 45 mins to Colombo
